DOC.brief_title: The eSVS ( TM ) Mesh External Saphenous Vein Support Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The objective eSVS™ Mesh Saphenous Vein Support Trial prospectively evaluate clinical safety efficacy eSVS™ Mesh treatment Saphenous Vein Graft ( SVG ) Coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) versus SVG CABG without eSVS™ Mesh . The eSVS™ Mesh External Saphenous Vein Support Trial prospective , multi-center , randomize , control trial enrol 120 patient multi-vessel coronary artery disease require SVG CABG Right Coronary Artery Circumflex Artery due atherosclerotic coronary artery disease . Patients serve control ( patient randomize either : 1 . SVG+eSVS™ Mesh Right Coronary Artery SVG Circumflex Artery 2 . SVG Right Coronary Artery SVG+eSVS™ Mesh Circumflex Artery ) . Clinical follow-up assessment consist physical exam , laboratory testing , medication review , adverse event monitoring enrol patient perform 30 day , 6 month 12 month . In addition , 12 month follow-up assessment include angiography . The investigational device evaluate clinical trial External Saphenous Vein Support device , eSVS™ Mesh . The eSVS™ Mesh extravascular prosthesis consist highly flexible , semi-compliant knit nitinol mesh tube place patient 's saphenous vein graft ( SVG ) coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) . The eSVS™ Mesh design : - provide radial support vein prevent graft dilatation - reduce vein graft diameter closely match target coronary artery diameter - provide uniform lumen - improve blood flow characteristic - mitigate development intimal hyperplasia graft stenosis The eSVS™ Mesh compliance characteristic comparable native internal thoracic artery . Since eSVS™ Mesh vascular prosthesis make nitinol , highly kink resistant .
